channel.title: Sakuli Docs on Sakuli E2E and Monitoring

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Initialisation This guide will get you started with writing Sakuli tests from scratch. To follow the tutorial, you should create a new npm project in an empty folder. For this guide, we will assume that our working directory is /tmp/sakuli_starter on a *nix system, or %Temp%\sakuli_starter on a Windows machine, respectively. To create a new, empty project, first run: npm init This interactive prompt will ask you for some metadata regarding your project.
